index.title: Deck Tracker
index.description: With NFC technology and this app, managing your cards is easy! Simply scan, track, and organize the cards in your deck with ease. You'll always know what's in your deck, allowing you to focus and enjoy the game more!

my_decks.title: My Decks
my_decks.tutorial: Here, you can view all your saved decks. Manage, edit, or track them easily from this page.

new_deck.title: New Deck

dialog.share: Your deck log has been copied to the clipboard for easy sharing.

delete.title: Delete All Cards
delete.content: Are you sure you want to permanently delete all cards in this deck? This action cannot be undone
delete.success: All cards in the deck deleted successfully.

new_deck.tutorial: Start building your deck! Add cards, organize them, and prepare for your next game.

tracker.title: Deck Tracker

dialog.title: Card Tracking Tutorial
dialog.content: On this page, you can scan cards while playing. When a card is scanned, it will be removed from the deck. Scanning it again adds it back. Tap OK to proceed.

tracker.tutorial: Use this feature to track your cards in real-time during a game. Simply scan your cards to update your deck's status.

scan.title: Scan Card
scan.tutorial: Use this tool to scan cards and view their details or status in real-time.

games.title: Games
games.tutorial: Choose the game you are playing to customize your decks and track your cards.

search.title: Search
search.internet_error: No internet connection. Please check your connection and try again.
search.tutorial: Looking for a card? Use the search feature to find specific cards across all your games.

custom.title: Custom
custom.tutorial: Create unique custom cards with personalized images and descriptions. Great for creating personalized decks or applying special rules for unique gameplay.

card.title: Card info

dialog.add_success: Card successfully added to your deck!
dialog.add_fail: Could not add the card to your deck.
dialog.read_fail: Failed to read the NFC tag.
dialog.write_fail: Failed to write to the NFC tag.

card.tutorial: Manage individual card details here. Add a name, description, and upload an image to personalize your cards.

settings.title: Settings
settings.tutorial: Customize your app experience by managing your account, adjusting preferences, and exploring additional features.

library.title: Library
library.tutorial: Browse all the cards and decks you have created or saved. Use this as a reference during games.
